arg.name: context
arg.help: CONTEXT: The extent (in characters) of the text or other content immediately surrounding the located word/phrase/object. By default this is either +- 100 characters (Publisher limit) or to the end of the object (paragraph). a single "characterExtent" field gives +- characterExtent (post == pre), while "characterExtent "characterExtent2" gives the preceeding and following text.

arg.name: xpath
arg.help: XPATH Defines the section/s of the document to analyze. The argument is one or more xpath strings separated by spaces. (The xpaths cannot contain spaces currently.)
